title: Iain Lee says Rebekah Vardy was 'unpleasant' to him on I'm A Celebrity
text:
Iain Lee says Rebekah Vardy was ‘dark’ and ‘unpleasant’ during their time on I’m A Celebrity (Picture: Rex, Getty)

The world is still reeling from Coleen Rooney’s jaw-dropping accusation that Rebekah Vardy was selling stories about her to the press.

And now Rebekah’s former I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out of Here camp mate Iain Lee has added his thoughts to the ongoing debate about the pair’s feud.

Speaking on his talkRADIO show about his famously strained relationship with Jamie Vardy’s wife, the broadcaster admitted he found the WAG to be ‘unpleasant’.

‘I didn’t get on with Rebekah [in the jungle]. I found her very dark… I got a very dark energy from her,’ he explained. ‘The first thing she said to me was “I thought you were an f**king t**t.”‘

He continued: ‘I found her thoroughly unpleasant. It’s no secret her and Jamie Lomas were my least favourite.’

The 46-year-old also claims Rebekah was mean to his sister and ‘summoned her’ to her room after she was booted out of the jungle.

Rebekah Vardy and Iain Lee famously clashed while in the Australian jungle back in 2017 (Picture: Rex Features)

His comments come after WAG Danielle Lloyd claimed she has had run-ins with Rebekah in the past about the pregnant star dishing her secrets to others.

Rebekah has fiercely denied allegations that she sold fake stories to the press about Coleen Rooney, after Wayne’s wife claimed to have caught her fellow WAG in an elaborate Instagram trap.

Coleen shared fake Instagram stories that only Rebekah could see to suss out whether she was the friend leaking her stories to the press.

While everyone is wading into the debate to share what they think happened, all eyes are on Rebekah to try and prove her innocence after she hired ‘forensic IT experts’ to try and clear her name.
